verses.name: Isaiah 2:12
verses.text: For the day of the Lord of hosts shall be upon every one that is proud and lofty, and upon every one that is lifted up; and he shall be brought low:

verses.name: Isaiah 2:13
verses.text: And upon all the cedars of Lebanon, that are high and lifted up, and upon all the oaks of Bashan,

verses.name: Isaiah 2:14
verses.text: And upon all the high mountains, and upon all the hills that are lifted up,

verses.name: Isaiah 2:15
verses.text: And upon every high tower, and upon every fenced wall,

verses.name: Isaiah 2:16
verses.text: And upon all the ships of Tarshish, and upon all pleasant pictures.
